fullDescription.intro: This node adds a fully connected layer to the Deep Learning Model supplied by the input port.
fullDescription.option: Allows to specify if you want to give the number of input neurons, the number of output neurons or both. If only one number is specified the other number will be calculated automatically if possible (currently only possible for Convolutional Networks).
The number of inputs for this layer.
The number of outputs for this layer.
The learning rate that should be used for this layer.
The strategy which will be used to set the initial weights for this layer.
The type of activation function that should be used for this layer.

ports.inPort: The model which will be extended by this layer.
ports.outPort: The model from the input port additionally containing this layer.
